page.title: 15RECREATION IN MARSKE AREA.
page.content: The leisure activities of this rural area are many and varied: Farmers go pheasant and grouse shooting using their own gun dogs. The pheasants are mostly hand reared, then released to shoot. There are quite a few riding horses kept. Walking and gardening are enjoyed by many and trout fishing and photography by a few. Canoeing is done on the river Swale. Motorbike trials are held in the area, the terrain being suited to this activity. Some residents are interested in music, books and woodwork, with a minority favouring the dramatic society and darts. Sailing, wind surfing and scouting are other hobbies enjoyed by some, the facilities being found outside the area.
